channel.title: Project 1337-Pwnage ~ The Pking Revoultion
channel.description:
[center][b]Project 1337-Pwnage As you would all know, runescape pking is dead. Many runescape pkers have resorted to Moparscape, but are yet to find a pking simulator server. This is our goal.
Introduction
The 1337-Pwnage project isn't just another zdiddyscape or Battlescape Blitz. This server will be perfect. It will be the best server in Mopar!
Goals This server will not be easy to code. It will require determination and skill. We have the goals and they will be completed.
Working special attacks - Like runescape Weapon Timers - Like runescape Food Timers - Like runescape Full defence system - Having defence counts for somthing Full Lunar Magics - On the 1337-Pwnage Client (proper sprites) Full Ancient Magiks. Full Modern Magics Single combat areas. Multi combat areas. Stable source code (no bugs/glitches) Full Range (Correct GFX and double hitting dbow, hits based off your bonus) Full prayer. (new prayers if possible) Training isn't hard about 80xp per hit (NPC training) Hp Goes up overtime. Full PVP combat Wilderness skulls. Working player kill Drops If your level 70 and your in level one wilderness you can attack level 69-71 No commands - Admin and mod exempt. Pking in wilderness only. Correct bonuses A nice econamy (easier than runescapes) Full potions. Nice shops.
What the 1337-Pwnage client will have.
Full Lunar Magic Full items like fighter torso and darkbow Clan chat All Magics on the magic tab (None on the bar next to friends) A interface like runescape's. Working prayer icons.
Website Goals Nice Vbulliten Forum 1000+active members Nice front page.
Server Host Details (if we get donations, we will purchase hosting.) Can you host 24-7: Can you host up to 150 people with no lag: How much RAM do you have: How much CPU do you have:
These goals will in NO way be easy. They can be achived. If we dedicate ourselfs we can creat time ultimate pking server.
Java Coder Application (5 coders will be accepted)
Will you commit yourself to the server: Are you active: How long have you been coding for: How old are you: What kind of work have you done: What part's of the goals would be hard for you(You will not be working alone, with the team):
Quick client note:If a good Pking item comes out, you will be required to code its abilities into the server.
Client Coder Application(5 Client Coders will be accepted)
Will you commit yourself to the server: Are you active: How long have you been coding for: How old are you: What kind of work have you done: What part's of the goals would be hard for you(You will not be working alone, with the team)::
Quick client note:If a good Pking item comes out, you will be required to add it into the client.
Website Developing(3 Developers will be accepted) Will you commit yourself to the server: Are you active: How long have you been coding for: How old are you: What kind of work have you done:
Quick note for the forum and website. Only The developers will get Admin on the website. The rest will be Super Mod.
GFX Artist(2 artists will be accpted) Will you commit yourself to the server: Are you active: How long have you been doing GFX for: How old are you: What kind of work have you done(show examples)
Quick note for the GFX artists. You will be required to make the forum banner a banner for the Moparscape topic (the one your reading now)
Java coders - - - - -
Client Coders - - - - -
Website Developers - - -
Server manager -Dr4g0n sc1m
Server Hoster -
GFX Artist's - -
Some quick notes
All people involved in the development of 1337-Pwnage WILL get a copy of the server files. These WILL NOT BE LEECHED. All people invloved in the development of 1337-pwnage WILL recive Admin on the server. All people accepted into the server development will get a @1337pwnagestaff email adress! I acctualy care about this project, i will not accept everybody that apply's, if somebody is better than you i will accept them.
Please contact me on MSN at dr4g0nsc1m@1337pwnagestaff.com if you have been accepted or have any questions.[/b][/center]
